entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
